ISSUE.TITLE: Vendors should see whether an order is cancelled or not
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When store owner cancel an order containing vendors products, the vendors doesn't see clearly that the order is canceled in the view /Admin/Order/List In my case the vendor see an order with payment status to pending and he doesn't know that the order is cancelled

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: We should not display a "in order to use this functionality..." warning on the customer details page beside "customer roles"

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #500 Vendors should see whether orders are cancelled or not
